description:
Designed for cold-weather climbs, the Enforcer Gloves provide warmth and protection for wet ice and taxing routes. They're waterproof, insulated and padded with goat leather palms so they'll stand up to sufferfest conditions. Stretch fabric and pre-curved, articulated fingers let you place pro and fiddle in V-threads.

  • Pertex Shield ripstop shell and a GORE-TEX membrane keep your hands dry
  • TPU patch over knuckles for abrasion-resistance
  • 170g PrimaLoft Gold insulation on the back of hand
  • Thick, sewn-in fleece lining is warm and soft
  • Goat leather palms, palm patchs, and finger caps
  • Hypalon wrist strap with hook-and-loop closure for a secure fit
  • Tool specific pre-curved fit and articulated fingers provide a comfortable, sure grip
  • Manufacturer's recommended temperature range: -18 to -1°C
name: Black Diamond Enforcer Gloves - Unisex
